name: SubnetRouteTableAssociation
shortDesc: Associates a subnet with a route table.

properties.name: RouteTableId
properties.desc: The ID of the route table. This is commonly written as a reference to a route table declared elsewhere in the template. For example:
properties.update: No interruption. However, the physical ID changes when the route table ID is changed.

properties.name: SubnetId
properties.desc: The ID of the subnet. This is commonly written as a reference to a subnet declared elsewhere in the template. For example:
